name: Up For Delivery
description:
"Solve puzzles to deliver packages to denizens of a mystifying and gravity defying world"

Platform: Windows    Genre: Puzzle     Status: Prototype

In 'Up For Delivery', the law of gravity is merely a polite suggestion.

When you accepted the job of delivering cabbages to occupants residing on a mobius strip, they didn't mention that your clients might live halfway up a mysterious mountain. Or past a maze of portals. Or beyond a flying whale.

Explore a vast world home to diverse environments from a cold and misty forest teaming with vibrant flowers, lit by a starry night sky. A warm and foggy mountain, home to the mysterious and illusive figure, the mountain man. The mind bending aqueducts, interconnected through giant propellers residing on what is believed to be an ancient celestial being. And the inviting town area, where the occupants of the mind bending world reside close to the continuous river. 

Are you able to deliver all cabbages? It might be easier said than done....
